DOC.brief_summary: A retrospective cross-sectional analytic study evaluation identification reason Scheduled elective surgical case cancellation Siriraj Hospital , reason cancellation extract hospital medical record case , review divide 2 group , SiPAC without SiPAC consultation . Primary outcome incidence cancel case cause cancellation secondary outcome identify area improvement .
DOC.brief_title: Scheduled Elective Surgical Case Cancellation Siriraj : Evaluation Identification Reasons
DOC.detailed_description: After approval Siriraj Institutional Review Board . All data case cancellation schedule elective surgical procedure retrieve database department Anesthesiology , Faculty Medicine Siriraj Hospital . Then , reason cancellation extract hospital medical record case . All case check database SiPAC , department Anesthesiology , Faculty Medicine Siriraj Hospital confirm whether patient preoperatively consult . All patient cancellation schedule elective surgery period one year review . Exclusion criteria 1 ) patient emergency urgency surgery mean patient ' name appear surgical schedule 2 ) miss key medical information . Admission record patient chart review divided 2 group , SiPAC without SiPAC consultation . Primary outcome incidence cancel case cause cancellation record categorized 6 group include 1 ) patient issue surgery refusal , show day surgery , transport problem 2 ) facility equipment need , improper estimate case time , case bump 3 ) Surgeon unavailable , due administrative schedule problem change line management respectively 4 ) anesthesiologist fail adequately prepare patient , lead misunderstand communication NPO violation , preoperative drug error 5 ) medical condition may impact patient 's ability endure anesthesia technique surgical procedure 6 ) miscellaneous . The result compare patient without SiPAC consultation analyze secondary outcome identify area improvement .
DOC.criteria: data case cancellation schedule elective surgical procedure patient emergency urgency surgery mean patient ' name appear surgical schedule
